title: Fireside with the Underboss - Hostage Gone Wrong
description: Everyone meet Allie Boy, Sammy's goombata; in this story these two get together to plan a robbery that goes completely sideways. The hostages outnumber them and Sammy ends up staring down the barrel of his own gun
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Everyone meet Allie Boy, Sammy's goombata; in this story these two get together to plan a robbery that goes completely sideways. The hostages outnumber them and Sammy ends up staring down the barrel of his own gun
